en: one of eight days of the traditional week
one of eight days of the traditional week

ngiemboon: Gʉa ńkaa tsɔ́ mejÿóon ńdɔg ńtó!

en: Here is the house which is closed.

ngiemboon: Mêmvfó ne ńjÿɔʼɔ legǐ, ḿbiŋe ḿpfɛ́.
en: The goat has burped the grass and is still eating.

ngiemboon: Te jÿɔʼɔ nò yɔɔn, tà nyìŋ júʼ.
en: Don't reveal this matter until someone hears.
put bundles of wood in places
k. squat cylindrical drum, hit with two drumsticks
